SELECT /* com.ohgiraffers.project.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#selectTotalCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD A
JOIN TBL_CATEGORY B ON (A.CATEGORY_CODE = B.CATEGORY_CODE)
JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO)
B.CATEGORY_NAME = #{ searchValue }
B.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
A.BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
A.BOARD_BODY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
AND A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.CATEGORY_CODE , B.CATEGORY_NAME , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_BODY , A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , C.NICKNAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.BOARD_STATUS FROM TBL_BOARD A JOIN TBL_CATEGORY B ON (A.CATEGORY_CODE = B.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON (A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO)
B.CATEGORY_NAME = #{ searchValue }
C.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
A.BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
A.BOARD_BODY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{ searchValue }, '%')
AND A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'
ORDER BY A.BOARD_NO DESC LIMIT #{ startRow }, #{ limit }

SELECT /* com.ohgiraffers.project.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#selectThumbnailList() */ A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TITLE , B.NICKNAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , C.ATTACHMENT_NO , C.ORIGINAL_NAME , C.SAVED_NAME , C.SAVE_PATH , C.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_BOARD A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT C ON (A.BOARD_NO = C.REF_BOARD_NO) WHERE A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.ATTACHMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.FILE_TYPE = 'TITLE' ORDER BY A.BOARD_NO DESC
